readable.title: 3334537556_a2cf4e9b9a
readable.content: A group of people on skis with two dogs . A man dressed in a horned hat poses for a picture on skis with three other people and a dog . Four people holding each others shoulders with a brown dog in front of them , standing on snow . People dressed in costumes are on skis . People , some dressed in costumes , and dogs on a snowy mountain .
